= Hadoop in action =

`MapReduce` framework donot allow user to use arbitrary class, such as interger, string, and so forth. It only allows user to use the class which can serilaze the data, so in `MapReduce` framwork, we use `IntWritable`, `BooleanWritable` and so forth to define key/value.
